name: !Mitosis
description:
Your human is being attacked by malevolent enemies who want to destroy every cell on their path! You, a rookie member of the WCSA (White Cell Security Agency), have been assigned to a very important cell. You must protect it at all costs, even if you or your fellow agents perish.

Guide your squad and save your cell!
